item.title: [ha5] Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Praetor

Trample

Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [ha5] Whirler Rogue
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Artificer

When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [ha5] Dromoka's Command
item.description:
Instant

Choose two —

• Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn.

• Target player sacrifices an enchantment.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

https://www.destructoid.com/stories/exclusive-here-s-a-look-at-some-upcoming-magic-arena-historic-anthology-v-cards-628930.phtml

item.title: [ha5] Intangible Virtue
item.description:
Enchantment

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

item.description:

Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

item.title: [ha5] Vault Skirge
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Imp

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Flying

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [ha5] Ojutai's Command
item.description:
Instant

Choose two —

• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

• You gain 4 life.

• Counter target creature spell.

• Draw a card.

item.title: [ha5] Trash for Treasure
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.

Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [ha5] Ancient Grudge
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact.

Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [ha5] Ray of Revelation
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target enchantment.

Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.description:

item.title: [sta] Urza's Rage
item.description:
Instant

Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)

This spell can't be countered.

Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

item.title: [sta] Tendrils of Agony
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.title: [sta] Teferi's Protection
item.description:
Instant

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

Exile Teferi's Protection.

item.title: [sta] Teferi's Protection
item.description:
Instant

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

Exile Teferi's Protection.

item.title: [sta] Tainted Pact
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

item.title: [sta] Tainted Pact
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

item.title: [sta] Primal Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Target player gains 7 life.

• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.

• Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
